divs: Sighting Detailsthe wife is 63& a half inches tall,we are at the mission and I am taking pictures of my wife and son coming to me.I am standing with my back to the sea and they are walking to me.The picture is taken over the mission to the northeast.Iam going to try and send you the pictures, they are digital but it is my first digital camera, I wish I would have had my new camera.If you need I can get my sons height also but I do not want this to get back to us but I'll help if I can.Try and let us know what there size are if you can.I would have to go to the area again to know for sure where the picture was taken.
Summary: I took the pictures but didn't see them,wife is pointing to them but does not know what or if she is seeing them
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Lompoc
There were no other sightings in Lompoc on or around February 6th 2003
This sighting has never been favorited.
